description:
Created by Xanderwood: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgavhR3F8gxYBwp2HFtRR0Q

Reviewed and edited by FoozleCC: https://www.youtube.com/c/FoozleCC

Controls: WASD to move and Space to attack! Survive as long as you can.

This game was analyzed in a YouTube video as the first episode of a new series where I peer review project files submitted from the community.  Check out the review video on YouTube and let me know what you think!

Consider subscribing or supporting my on Patreon if you enjoy my content! http://bit.ly/PatreonFoozleCC

Special thanks to Xanderwood for kicking off the series with Survival Slash! I play the submission and then analyze the project file, recreating various elements to offer alternatives and commenting on things I really enjoyed, in this episode the following topics are covered:

-Utilizing Arrays with AJAX

-Timer Behavior

-AI: Intercept math

-State Machines

-Javascript setting instance variables

In this series I will often ask the developer to use art from my itch pages, this submission utilizes the Lucifer collection: https://itch.io/c/1557879/lucifer 

If you noticed I have a new theme I am using for Construct 3 which is absolutely awesome and available from Mitsuhashish's itch page: https://mitsuhashish.itch.io/darcss
